video.title: Star Trek: The Animated Series
video.synopsis: The starship Enterprise takes on new adventures in this colorful cartoon series featuring the voices of the original "Star Trek" cast.

episodes.synopsis: In orbit around a dead star, the Enterprise comes across a huge starship inhabited by a parasitic life form that threatens the entire ship.
episodes.title: Beyond the Farthest Star

episodes.synopsis: Spock must return to his own past on Vulcan to prevent his death as a youngster.
episodes.title: Yesteryear

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise races to find a way to stop a cloud from destroying inhabited planets.
episodes.title: One of Our Planets Is Missing

episodes.synopsis: The men of the Enterprise are victimized by a race of beautiful women who stay immortal by draining the lifeforce of men.
episodes.title: The Lorelei Signal

episodes.synopsis: Cyrano Jones returns, along with new tribbles that can't multiply.
episodes.title: More Tribbles, More Troubles

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise finds missing trader and philanthropist Carter Winston, but he may not be what he appears to be.
episodes.title: The Survivor

episodes.synopsis: Kirk and the crew are faced with a race of intelligent plants and a mad scientist who wants to impose peace on the galaxy.
episodes.title: The Infinite Vulcan

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise goes to the center of the galaxy, where they find a race of powerful aliens who once fled Earth.
episodes.title: The Magicks of Megus-Tu

episodes.synopsis: Kirk returns to the "shore leave" planet, but it's not as peaceful as it was when they last saw it.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Planet

episodes.synopsis: The crew encounters Harry Mudd again, who is selling a fake love potion.
episodes.title: Mudd's Passion

episodes.synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise finds themselves shrinking after being bathed with radiation.
episodes.title: The Terratin Incident

episodes.synopsis: While exploring the planet Argo, Kirk and Spock are turned into water breathers.
episodes.title: The Ambergris Element

episodes.synopsis: Spock, Sulu and Uhura are captured by the Kzinti, who are trying to learn the secret of an ancient weapon.
episodes.title: The Slaver Weapon

episodes.synopsis: While searching for a lost ship, Kirk, Spock and McCoy are captured and placed in a zoo by advanced, telepathic aliens.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder

episodes.synopsis: Kirk leads a party to retrieve a religious relic that was stolen.
episodes.title: Jihad

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise and a Klingon ship must join forces to escape from a pocket universe that has been trapping starships for centuries.
episodes.title: The Time Trap

episodes.synopsis: When Spock is stricken by a disease fatal to Vulcans, the Enterprise is to meet a freighter with a load of drugs that provides the only cure.
episodes.title: Pirates of Orion

episodes.synopsis: On a planetary survey mission, Kirk and Spock have to deal with a reckless observer named Bem.
episodes.title: Bem

episodes.synopsis: After passing through an unusual cloud, the Enterprise computer develops a playful, and potentially lethal, personality.
episodes.title: The Practical Joker

episodes.synopsis: Dr. McCoy is arrested and held responsible for causing a plague that ravaged the planet Dramia Two, where he did a mass inoculation 19 years earlier.
episodes.title: Albatross

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise crew encounters an alien who visited Earth in ancient times and became known as the Mayan god Kukulkan.
episodes.title: How, Sharper Than a Serpent's Tooth

episodes.synopsis: The Enterprise tries to save an unidentified ship plunging into a supernova but is dragged into a universe where time runs backwards.
episodes.title: The Counterclock Incident
